job_details.degree_required: BS degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required

jd: From: Sridhar Goud, Softcom Systems, Inc sri@softcomsystems.com Reply to: sri@softcomsystems.com .Net Senior Developer/LeadLocation: Newark, NJ - Need locals onlyHybrid (3 days onsite)Long Term ContractInterview Mode: Inperson interview at Newark,NJ is Mandatory for this roleJob Description:• BS degree in Computer Science, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required• 12+ years of current experience in Software Development• Experience with one or more object-oriented programming language, e.g. C#, .NET Core, SQL, etc.• Knowledge of database systems including Oracle and SQL Server• Strong PL\SQL or stored procedure experience• Strong analytical skills, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret business needs and translate them into application requirements• Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively and confidently communicate with users, team members, and management• Ability to develop effective internal/external working relationships with both business units and vendors• Familiarity with Microsoft Fabric Experience with the following would be a plus:• Microsoft Fabric experience is plus• Application Lifecycle Management techniques and concepts• Experience with investments or securities• Ability to work with Agile methodologies in a fast paced environment• Experience with one or more object-oriented programming language C#• Test Driven Development, Entity Framework, MVC• TFS/Bit bucket source control tool• Autosys job management experience• JIRA experience for Agile Projects• Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery (CICD) tools such as Jenkins and automated processes• API management software like Apigee or equivalent Thanks & RegardsSridhar GoudSoftcom Systems, Inc.Your trusted technology partner....Email : sri@softcomsystems.com104 Tamarack Circle, Skillman NJ 08558, Fax: 609-751-9077LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/imsri504/
